snippet.title: The Inner Friend - April 2018 Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive with us into the eerie world of The InnerFriend and face your childhood fears. The game is set to release by the end of 2018.

We'll be at PAX East! Come and try the game at booth #17115

You can find us on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/790350/The_InnerFriend/
Or visit our website : http://theinnerfriend.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theinnerfriend/

Follow PLAYMIND on social media: 
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/playmind/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playmind
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playmindmtl/
Website: http://playmind.com/
